subject: Tennis
Retirement
lead_paragraph: The two-time Grand Slam champion Mary Pierce is not ready to hang up her racket just yet. Despite being sidelined by a knee injury since 2006, Pierce told the sports daily L’Équipe that she would like to play again at the French Open.
snippet: The two-time Grand Slam champion Mary Pierce is not ready to hang up her racket just yet. Despite being sidelined by a knee injury since 2006, Pierce told the sports daily L’Équipe that she would like to play again at the French Open.
